name: Kakoon
description:
Uncover the secrets of the jungle at the hands of a revenge-seeking-blood-thirsty ape and his companion. Stomp, crush and rip apart those who try to stop you.

Features
  • Fast-paced combat. Use your agility and strength to overcome frenetic battles.
  • Dynamic pacing. Enjoy each level as a unique experience with endless AI generated hordes of enemies.
  • Different difficulty levels and modifiers for extra challenges and replayability.
  • Many creative ways of killing with gory results.
Influence

Some games that inspired me for doing this: Doom, Bayonetta, Vermintide 2.
